title: S13 Ep105: Monstrosity
itunes:title: Monstrosity
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS faces a Monstrosity today with comedian David Race!

"Monstrosity" is a creepy and hilarious podcast, created and hosted by Los Angeles comedian and paranormal enthusiast, David Race.

David joins us to talk about his NBE, Near Bigfoot Encounter and seeing UFOs.

David has appeared on the Howard Stern show, Jimmy Kimmel Live.
He was the creator and host of the popular online show "Comedians Talking About Bigfoot", which became a TV pilot. He is currently the creator and host of the podcast Monstrosity with David Race.

www.DavidRace.com

http://www.comedianstalkingaboutbigfoot.com/

https://www.monstrositypodcast.com/
